trends: There has been one other sighting in Highlands
There were no other sightings in Highlands on or around August 8th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi had a daytime sighting on an unidentified flying object this past weekend while at the beach (sandy hook, nj). i decided to take a quick dip in the ocean, and was hanging out in the water and checking out the sky... there was a really cool rainbow halo (sun dog?) around the sun, due to the lightly overcast skies. anyway, i was watching a commercial jetliner flying through the sun dog (which was to the west) and thought it was pretty cool... as i was watching it, i noticed a small dark object about 1\2 or 1 mile behind the plane at what seemed to be roughly the same altitude (maybe around 7k to 10k feet? there is a lot of air traffic at this location due to the proximity to newark intl & ny area airports)... the object was small since it was pretty far away... it looked like maybe the size of a small pea at arms length. it was small enough that i couldn't make out any significant details or features on it... besides the fact that it was a solid object. it was round\discoid and maybe spherical (but not sure) and was moving erratically. at first i thought "hmmm... wow is that a large bird flying\gliding in the thermals that high in the sky?" but then the object did something that totally dispelled that theory. it stopped flying and hovered in a wobbly fashion... and then it moved very quickly to the left (towards the south) and stopped on a dime... it then hovered for a couple of seconds again while looking all wobbly... and then shot back over the right (towards the north) by what i could guess was a few hundred feet almost instantaneously and stopped on a dime again and hovered while looking a bit wobbly... at this point i was asking myself "what the heck is this thing????". then as it was hovering it did a star trek "warp speed" kind of acceleration in speed and flew downwards and then back up in a "u" shaped flight pattern and just shot off and disappeared!!! when it did that i actually said out loudly "what the hell???? what was that?????" and there were a few people that were swimming in the water a few feet away from me that were looking at me like i was nuts. i stood there for a minute or two looking up at the sky to see if it would come back, but it was gone... and it never came back. at that point i rand out of the water to my wife to tell her what i saw. i have tried to think of several different explanations of what this object could have been. it was definitely a real, solid object and it seemed to be intelligently controlled. it was not a bird, not a balloon, not anything that could ordinarily be explained. i don't have any pictures or any evidence... just an explanation of what i saw... and i'm hoping that there were other reports from the area that would corroborate my sighting.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Watched unidentified object flying erratically and very fast while on the beach and then shot off at "warp speed" and disappeared
